head.description: Holidays at top ski resorts - with Interhome in a private chalet, holiday house or apartment

links.label: Safe, enjoyable holidays - discover our holiday ideas

content.textLeft:
Enjoy Europe’s top ski resorts and experience an unforgettable ski holiday with Interhome. Our cosy chalets, wonderful holiday houses, ski lodges located right by the slopes and unique holiday apartments ensure that we have a property for every taste and budget. 

Whether you’re spending your holiday as a couple, as a small group or with family or lots of friends, our holiday properties in Tyrol, Gasteinertal, Chamonix, Val Thorens, Tignes, Grindelwald, Zermatt, St. Moritz, Saas Fee, Davos, Nendaz or Verbier will satisfy your every need.
content.textRight: Similarly, whether you’re looking to ski, snowboard or head off on cross-country trails or tours, your winter sports heart will beat faster when choosing those with lengthy downhill sections and broad slopes, fresh powdery snow and endless possibilities for a variety of ski runs. At your holiday home, why not spend the evenings completely relaxed in your own cosy living room where you’ll find a comfy sofa and, depending on the holiday accommodation, even a warm, flickering open fire waiting for you. Or perhaps you’ll want to head off out once more to one of the many après ski parties.

elements.title: Freedom, privacy and space in your holiday home
elements.caption: Your stay in a holiday house or a holiday apartment offers plenty of advantages: spend your time exactly as you want. No disturbance from other guests or hotel staff, just spend your holiday according to your own rules. Whether you are looking for a city trip, a relaxing holiday with your family or with friends. Simply enjoy lots of room, flexibility and freedom in your holiday home.
